notifications.body:
How do you like your Vaadin? What do you usually have as a side-dish with it? Where do you find your recipes for awesome apps?

Results will be public info in the blog so you can see how others have answered. And we'll learn more about the community at the same time.

Help Vaadin by answering this one page survey.
notifications.title: Vaadin Community Survey

notifications.body:
Want to have a Vaadin presentation at your local event? We've received really good feedback and are happy to join you and your group as well – let's schedule it together!

Contact Vaadin Advocate Ville Ingman at ville@vaadin.com for more info.
notifications.title: Speech at your meetup or company?

notifications.body: Want to meet other Vaadin developers in Finland and hear the latest in good company while having something to eat and drink?
notifications.title: Join Meetup Group Finland
